testcase.name: Verify title of landing page
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to bionic landing page with "https://bionic.co.uk/"........passed When I verify tile content "Bionic - Your Business Essentials Sorted | Bionic".passed Then I close the browser....................................................passed

testcase.name: Web form and lead creation
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to bionic web-form page "https://bionic-qa.makeiteasy.com/business-energy/web-form/".passed When I enter full name "Ravi Ahuja".........................................passed And I enter valid email address "ravi.ahuja@bionic.co.uk"...................passed And I enter valid company name "Jeevat LTD".................................passed And I enter valid phone number "07504555555"................................passed And I click Get a quote button..............................................passed Then I verify lead is created in SalesForce.................................passed And I close the browser.....................................................passed
